name: Luntik: Matematika dlya malishey
storyline: The game itself is based on solving mathematical problems that are not connected to each other by a common plot. If the player solves all the problems, he will receive a prize - an episode of the animated series called "Dream".
summary: The project of the series "Luntik. Preparing for School", which includes five educational games for children aged 5-7. This is a children's educational computer game about Luntik - a character from the cartoon of the same name. Traveling through a wonderful fairy-tale world with Luntik and his friends, little players will learn to perform basic arithmetic operations - add, subtract and compare numbers, as well as tell time on the clock. Fun mini-games and meetings with the heroes of their favorite cartoon in new funny situations await the little ones.
